archimate:InfluenceRelationship.documentation:
Teams not booking the SAR2 reviews have basically only gone through a process of self assessment which provides limited value as we suffer from Dunning-Kruger effect. The Dunning-Kruger effect is a cognitive bias where individuals with low ability at a particular task overestimate their own competence.
In other words, people who lack knowledge or skills in a specific area may mistakenly believe that they are more knowledgeable or skilled than they actually are.
